captain.name: Captain
captain.description: The <y>Captain</c> is a heavy-hitting zoner who can dampen the chaos of the battlefield, using his <y>Orbital Supply Beacons</c> and <y>Defensive Microbots</c> to relieve himself and allies alike. Combining a well-timed <y>Power Tazer</c> shot with <y>Orbital Probe</c> strikes will devastate most crowds with ease, all while your trusty <y>Vulcan Shotgun</c> clears up whatever remains.
captain.endQuote: ..and so he left, with a new tale to tell.
captain.story:
<ul>Passenger Details:</c>
<g>[Employee Class]</c>

<ul>Employee Details:</c>
I'm excited to announce that the UES has chosen one of its finest captains for this shipping expedition. They have successfully overseen dozens of similiar missions ever since entering retirement from the military back in 2037, and I don't expect this one to be any different. Treat them with utmost care and respect.

<b>[SECURITY RECALL]</c>
<ul>[Event C1]</c> Employee requested a contracted commando to deliver a parcel into their quarters. Request granted.
<ul>[Event C2]</c> Employee observed inspecting their parcel. Its contents seem to be multiple unidentified metal spheres. Whirring and chirping could be heard during the inspection.
<ul>[Event C3]</c> A foreign entity is seen entering through left wall of the control room. Passengers have been notified to report any suspicious activity to the captain.
<ul>[Event C4]</c> <r>[OVERRIDE]</c> ALERT. ALL ONBOARD PERSONNEL ARE TO EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY. THIS IS NOT A DRILL, REPEAT, THIS IS NOT A DR-

captainZ.name: Vulcan Shotgun
captainZ.description: Fire a blast of pellets for <y>8x60% damage</c>. Charging the attack narrows the <b>spread</c> and increases <b>range</c>.

captainX.name: Power Tazer
captainX.description: Fire a fast tazer for <y>60% damage</c>, <y>shocking</c> enemies, immobilizing them.

captainC.name: Orbital Probe
captainC.description: Request up to <y>3</c> Orbital Probes. Each probe deals <y>500% damage</c> and <y>stuns</c>.

captainC_1.name: Orbital Probe
captainC_1.description: Request an Orbital Probe, dealing <y>500% damage</c> and <y>stunning</c>.

captainV.name: Orbital Supply Beacon
captainV.description: Request a <b>permanent</c> Supply Beacon. Can only be requested <b>twice per stage</c>.

captainBeaconHealing.name: Beacon: Healing
captainBeaconHealing.description: <g>Heal</c> all nearby allies for <g>10%</c> of their <g>maximum health</c> every second.

captainBeaconHealing_1.name: Beacon: Healing
captainBeaconHealing_1.description: <g>Heal</c> all nearby allies for <g>10%</c> of their <g>maximum health</c> every second.

captainBeaconShocking.name: Beacon: Shocking
captainBeaconShocking.description: Periodically <y>shock</c> all nearby enemies, immobilizing them.

captainBeaconShocking_1.name: Beacon: Shocking
captainBeaconShocking_1.description: Periodically <y>shock</c> all nearby enemies, immobilizing them.

captainBeaconHacking.name: Beacon: Hacking
captainBeaconHacking.description: <b>Hack</c> all nearby purchasables to a cost of <b>$0</c> over time.

captainBeaconHacking_1.name: Beacon: Hacking
captainBeaconHacking_1.description: <b>Hack</c> all nearby purchasables to a cost of <b>$0</c> over time.

captainBeaconUpgrade.name: Beacon: Upgrade
captainBeaconUpgrade.description:
<b>Upgrade</c> all nearby interactables once over time. 
<b>Upgrading</c> an interactable to its highest tier requires 2 beacons.

captainBeaconUpgrade_1.name: Beacon: Upgrade
captainBeaconUpgrade_1.description:
<b>Upgrade</c> all nearby interactables once over time. 
<b>Upgrading</c> an interactable to its highest tier requires 2 beacons.

captainUnavailable.name: Unavailable
captainUnavailable.description: You have already called in a Supply Drop this stage.

defensiveMicrobots.name: Defensive Microbots
defensiveMicrobots.pickup: Shoot down nearby projectiles. Recharge rate scales with the amount of drones you have.
defensiveMicrobots.description: Shoot down projectiles within <y>20m</c> <c_stack>(+10m per stack)</c> every <y>1 second</c>. <b>Recharge rate scales with the amount of drones you have</c>.
defensiveMicrobots.story:
Be careful with these - they're fragile and potentially highly explosive if not handled correctly.

I'm not sure how a prototype of a highly advanced defensive system made specifically for combat scenarios would be useful on a shipping expedition, but I'm here to make sure this gets delivered to the right person, not to ask pointless questions.

I'm expecting adequate payment within the next 3 days. I didn't put my job on the line for nothing.
